options.description: Merges overlapping alignments regardless of match dir or frame and does not display any idenitity information.
Include percent coverage information in the output
Display the alignment direction in the additional FRM columns (default for promer)
Do not print the output header
Set minimum percent identity to display

Knockout (do not display) alignments that overlap another alignment in a different frame by more than 50% of their length, AND have a smaller percent similarity or are less than 75% of the size of the other alignment (promer only)
Include the sequence length information in the output
Set minimum alignment length to display
Annotate maximal alignments between two sequences, i.e. overlaps between reference and query sequences
Sort output lines by query IDs and coordinates
Sort output lines by reference IDs and coordinates
